meanings.definition: An ancient Greek city located in Acarnania.
meanings.english_definition: An ancient Greek city located in Acarnania.

examples.sentence: Strongylon was an important city in ancient Acarnania.
examples.translation: ストロンギロンは古代アカルナニアの重要な都市でした。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek Στρογγυλόν (Strongulón), derived from στρόγγυλος (stróngulos, “round”).
